Author: Tony Crisci
Comment:
#example configuration
bindsym $mod+button2 kill
bindsym button2 kill
bindsym button3 floating toggle
bindsym $mod+button3 floating toggle
bindsym button9 move left
bindsym button8 move right
# these don't work - we don't get the event
bindsym $mod+button4 focus up
bindsym $mod+button5 focus down

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: I don't want to implement the bar bindsyms because it is too complicated and not very useful.

Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: The above comment is important in describing how this works now. I think this is a sane default for now. I doubt anyone will need any extra configuration than this, but implementing a switch for which part of the window triggers the binding would not be difficult.

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Can you update docs/userguide with this please?

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: The patch looks good apart from the missing documentation update.
